node.display_long_description:
Create sprawling, brilliant worlds and explore them with your friends! Invite your friends to an online game, then race to the finish with hang-gliders, or switch to climbing mode for even more fun.

Discover thousands of amazing creations in the interactive gallery then remix them however you want! When you're happy with your creation, you can upload to the SculptrVR content gallery and let others see the incredible things you've made.
 
Unleash your creativity by building with SculptrVR’s intuitive and fun creation tools. Then destroy it all with rockets!
 
Add mind-boggling detail with SculptrVR's voxel tech and 10,000X zoom.

Export everything you’ve made to FBX or OBJ  for 3D printing or sharing online!

Procedurally generate landscapes, then delve underground, but be careful not to delve too deep!

There’s a million ways to have fun in SculptrVR and in your world, anything is possible.

---
For tips, tutorial videos and support visit https://www.sculptrvr.com/.

nodes.title: Detail Options and Lockable Multiplayer Rooms
nodes.body_text:
I want to thank everyone in the SculptrVR community for their continued support, this is our first release in a long time and contains: new, higher quality graphics settings, multiplayer improvements - you can now ‘lock’ sessions and when a player is kicked from a session they will be unable to rejoin.

Over the next few months we’ll be tackling more of our most requested features/improvements!

If you have ideas, you can join our Discord here:
https://discord.com/invite/qEX5ZKG

Or add to our ideas board by going here:
https://sculptrvr.upvoty.com/


Once a Player is Kicked - they cannot rejoin!
One problem was unwanted players joining a session multiple times even after being kicked. Now, after a player is kicked, they will be unable to rejoin!

Lockable Multiplayer Rooms
You can now "lock" and "unlock" your multiplayer SculptrVR room to prevent/allow new players from joining.

Higher Quality Graphics
SculptrVR can show dramatically more polygons... at the cost of some dropped frames. We added a ‘Detail’ setting which can be used to seriously improve the visible mesh detail of your sculptures.

To change the detail: On SculptrVR’s hand menu, simply click the icon of a folder with a gear, and then choose ‘Settings’ -> ‘Detail’
- Normal: Current default
- High:  This setting might not be as smooth in all circumstances, but for most people it will be fine.
- Too High: This setting is likely to show a lot of detail but likely to have poor performance on detailed scenes

Analytics
Google Analytics for Firebase is now integrated

Bug Fixes
- Export menu: Took out the word "Tex." because it was likely to be misinterpreted as "Texture" rather than “Text.” (The FBX export option continues to use the ASCII text format)
- The size of text on some buttons has been reduced to better fit inside the button.

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: Agree with other recent reviews needs development and updates. User Interface improvements.  Rendering issues some.  Great potential expect more at the price.  Some user interface improvements would be welcome too.  Clips of graphics quality level of detail is misleading in clips of apps.  I do hope this app gets updated and like it but as others have said could be much better in many respects.  App is between 3-4 stars.

website_page_meta.description:
Create sprawling, brilliant worlds and explore them with your friends! Invite your friends to an online game, then race to the finish with hang-gliders, or switch to climbing mode for even more fun!

SculptrVR makes it easy to create, explore, and share incredible sculptures with friends. SculptrVR's 10,000x zoom enables massive creations with tiny details. With SculptrVR’s intuitive and powerful tools, you can make anything!
website_page_meta.title: SculptrVR · Oculus Quest
